meanings.definition: The act of intertwining or being intertwined.
meanings.sent1: The intetwinement of the vines created a beautiful pattern in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The intetwinement of the threads made the fabric strong and durable.
meanings.sent3: The intetwinement of the spaghetti on my fork was so tangled, it looked like a messy nest.
meanings.sent4: The intetwinement of their destinies was evident from the moment they met.
meanings.sent5: The intetwinement of the branches in the forest canopy created a mesmerizing sight.

meanings.definition: A complex or intricate relationship or connection between two or more things.
meanings.sent1: The intetwinement of their thoughts led to a deep understanding between them.
meanings.sent2: The intetwinement of their interests made them inseparable friends.
meanings.sent3: The intetwinement of their schedules made it impossible to meet for coffee.
meanings.sent4: The intetwinement of their fates seemed to be written in the stars.
meanings.sent5: The intetwinement of their lives was like a beautifully woven tapestry.
